entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
